movies.title: The Good Samaritan
movies.plot: The video begins with a moving song which tells us that our "hands are the Lord's hands", and asks for His help for living in peace with our neighbors. Suddenly, we are in a room with Jesus and His Disciples. He tells them that many people have desired salvation. In a corner of the room, two men are in deep discussion. One of them, a lawyer, challenges Jesus to tell him what is to be done to inherit eternal life. Jesus tells the story of a man who needed to travel a dangerous road to Jericho to buy spices. We are transported by Jesus' words to a wayside inn. The innkeeper's young son overhears two robbers plotting to steal from people on the road. The scene shifts to the home of Jewish spice merchant. His wife worries about his trip to Jericho. But he must make the journey, so he bids his family farewell. On a isolated, mountainous road, the two robbers hide among the rocks. Soon the spice merchant comes into view. The robbers steal his gold and leave him for dead on the deserted road...
movies.simplePlot: The video begins with a moving song which tells us that our "hands are the Lord's hands", and asks for His help for living in peace with our neighbors. Suddenly, we are in a room with Jesus...

biography.bio: Ivan Crosland was born on August 29, 1936. He was an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The ButterCream Gang (1992) and Brigham City (2001). He died on March 26, 2015 in Provo, Utah, USA.
biography.name: Ivan Crosland

biography.bio: David Spencer is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: David Spencer

biography.bio: Michael McGlone is an Actor, Writer, Director, Producer, Singer/Songwriter and Performer. He began his career on the screen with his critically acclaimed performance in the 1995 Sundance Film Festival Best Film Award Winner, The Brothers McMullen, from where he went on to star in such movies as She's the One, One Tough Cop, The Bone Collector, Dinner Rush and Hard Ball... In a return to the screen with Eddie Burns in their third feature film together, The Fitzgerald Family Christmas, McGlone played the fiery and robust Quinn Fitzgerald...after which he continued his recurring work on CBS's Person of Interest... In this next phase of his prolific career, Michael McGlone has created Kenny The Gun, the story of New York City Cop, Kenneth Patrick Sullivan, Detective 1st Grade, who ironically in the afterglow his greatest success, finds himself at a painful crossroads. As a consummate Irish New Yorker, McGlone unforgettably delivers the story of the quintessential Irish Cop, Kenny The Gun, in his powerful One Man Show. "This is the launch of Kenny The Gun," says Michael; "this is how I'm introducing the Series to the world."
biography.name: Michael McGlone

biography.bio: Walt Price is an actor, known for The Time Machine (1978), Beyond and Back (1978) and Tom Edison: The Boy Who Lit Up the World (1979).
biography.name: Walt Price

biography.bio: Michael Bennett is an actor, known for The Joseph Smith Story (1988) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).

biography.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Lisa Michelson was born on March 31, 1958 in New York City, New York, USA as Lisa Paulette Michelson. She was an actress, known for My Neighbor Totoro (1988), Kiki's Delivery Service (1989) and Fist of the North Star (1986). She was married to Gregory Snegoff. She died on September 14, 1991 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
biography.name: Lisa Michelson

biography.name: James Horrocks

biography.bio: Tamara Fowler is an actress, known for Mr. Krueger's Christmas (1980), The Hideout (1977) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987). She is married to John Adams.
biography.name: Tamara Fowler

biography.bio: Wayne Richards is an actor, known for Latter-Day Saint Leaders: Past and Present (1948), Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).

biography.bio: David Jensen was born on December 30, 1947 in Logan, Utah, USA. He was an actor, known for Species (1995), Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988) and The Substitute 3: Winner Takes All (1999). He was married to Jan L. Anderson and Carole L. Taylor. He died on November 29, 1998 in Salt Lake City, Utah.
biography.name: David Jensen
